name: Spacerocks
tagline: Asteroids clone based on glhck and glfw
body:
### Controls

 * Arrow keys turn and accelerate
 * Space shoots
 * Z/X change weapons when you have several


### Building from source
```
$ git clone https://github.com/bzar/spacerocks.git
$ cd spacerocks
$ git submodule update --init --recursive
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake ..
$ make
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
